title: Build a Useful Mini Sentence in Finnish: Se on ...

media:group.media:title: Build a Useful Mini Sentence in Finnish: Se on ...
media:group.media:description:
In this video lesson we will go over the short and simple start of a sentence "se on.." which can be built upon to create loads of different small sentences in Finnish!

Summary📝
- Se on = It is
For example: 
- Se on kylmä = It is cold
- Se on paras = It is the best
- Se on koira = It is a dog
- Se on valkoinen = It is white
- Se on hauska leffa = It is a fun movie
- Se on tosi pelottava = It is very scary
- Se on vähän suolainen = It is a little salty
And so on 😊
